org.svvrl.goal.core.io

Class PNGCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.AbstractImageCodec
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.PNGCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Codec

    public class PNGCodec
extends AbstractImageCodec
    This class can encode an automaton as a PNG image.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

      • getSuffix

        public java.lang.String getSuffix()
        Description copied from interface: Codec
        Returns the file extension. It will be used when encoding an object as a file by this codec.
        Returns:
        a file extension starting with a "."

      • getFormat

        public java.lang.String getFormat()
        Description copied from class: AbstractImageCodec
        Returns the informal format name of the image. The name must be one of the names returned by ImageIO.getWriterFormatNames().
